after-taste.name: After Taste
after-taste.description: An app for recording tasting notes for whiskey, wine, beer, coffee, and more

pocket-ai.name: Pocket AI
pocket-ai.description: Offline LLM-based AI assistant and translation application

sections.title: 1. Personal Information Collected
content: This app does not currently provide online sync functionality, and all data is stored only on your device.
Data stored on device: Tasting notes (beverage type, name, rating, notes, and other information you enter)

sections.title: 2. Purpose of Collection and Use
sections.content: This app does not collect any personal information. All tasting records are stored and managed only on your device.

sections.title: 3. Retention Period
sections.content: All data created in the app is stored only on your device and will be deleted when you uninstall the app.

sections.title: 4. Disclosure to Third Parties
sections.content: This app does not share your data with any third parties.

sections.title: 5. Data Deletion
sections.content: When you delete the app, all data stored on your device will be automatically deleted.

sections.title: 6. Future Updates
sections.content: If online sync functionality is added in the future, this privacy policy will be updated and users will be notified in advance.

sections.title: 7. Privacy Officer
sections.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us using the information below.

sections.title: 1. Personal Information Collected
content: This app operates in a completely offline environment and does not collect any personal information.
Data stored on device: AI model files (Gemma), conversation history, translation history (all stored locally)

sections.title: 2. Purpose of Collection and Use
sections.content: This app does not collect any personal information. The AI model operates completely offline after the initial download, and all conversation and translation processing occurs only on your device.

sections.title: 3. Retention Period
sections.content: All data created in the app (conversation history, translation history) is stored only on your device and will be deleted when you uninstall the app.

sections.title: 4. Disclosure to Third Parties
sections.content: This app is completely offline and does not transmit your data to external servers or share it with third parties.

sections.title: 5. Data Deletion
sections.content: When you delete the app, all data stored on your device (AI model, conversation history, translation history) will be automatically deleted.

sections.title: 6. Offline Features
content: AI Chat: Fully offline AI conversation using the Gemma model
Translation: Translation service that works offline
All processing is performed locally on your device and does not require an internet connection.

sections.title: 7. Privacy Officer
sections.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us using the information below.
